#text=After a long day , it 's such a relaxing thing to do .
#text=I turned the hot and cold handles to the exact right place out of habit and filled tub with hot water .
#text=I slid down into the tub and was instantly comfortable .
#text=My aching muscles were finally getting to relax .
#text=As I let the water warm me up , I washed myself with a soapy washcloth careful to get all the dirt and grime off .
#text=After cleaning up a bit , I grabbed my book and began to read .
#text=After about 20 minutes I let the water drain .
#text=I got out and dried off with my huge , soft towel .
#text=I put on my robe and threw the towel over the edge off the bathtub .
#text=I felt completely refreshed and ready to continue reading in my bedroom , and my muscles were n't quite as sore as before .
